dspace-header.title: UBC Registry
dspace-header.contributor.author: John Hsu
dspace-header.description: Custom metadata to cover use cases that doesn't fit dc or dcterms.

dc-type.scope_note: If user can't find a resource type that fit their submission, they may specify a custom resource type.
Text blurbs for display in various areas. Meant as a replacement for DSpace's news system, which loses data due to the docker build process.

This item describes the learning object. A local controlled vocabulary is assigned and includes: Assignments/Homework, Concept/Clicker Questions, Course Calendar, Course Data, Course Logistics, Demos & Simulation, Exams, In-Class Activities, Instructor Reflection, Lab/Field Activities, Learning Goals/Objectives, Lecture Notes, Other(solutions,etc), Overview, Resources, Student Difficulties, Ungraded Assessment Tools

Content features of the resource, such as accessible media, supported enhancements for accessibility and alternatives. Expected Values: alternativeText annotations audioDescription bookmarks braille captions ChemML describedMath displayTransformability highContrastAudio highContrastDisplay index largePrint latex longDescription MathML none printPageNumbers readingOrder rubyAnnotations signLanguage structuralNavigation synchronizedAudioText tableOfContents taggedPDF tactileGraphic tactileObject timingControl transcript ttsMarkup unlocked

A characteristic of the described resource that is physiologically dangerous to some users. Expected Values: flashing noFlashingHazard motionSimulation noMotionSimulationHazard sound noSoundHazard unknown none
